invocation.name: Sardura's Vision I
invocation.description: Enables the person to know whether someone is lying or not. Grants a bonus of one half the invocation roll to perception guile rolls. Lasts for a conversation.

invocation.name: Dulcia's Song I
invocation.description: Enhances one of a person's musical skills, giving a bonus of one fifth invocation roll. Lasts until sleep.

invocation.name: Ecstasy I
invocation.description: Causes intense pleasure in the person touched. They will do almost anything that is not life threatening for the pleasure to continue, unless a will versus charisma roll is made, with the priestess getting a bonus equal to one fifth the invocation roll.

invocation.name: Silver Tongue I
invocation.description: Increases oratory, bargaining and leadership skills by one fifth the invocation roll. Lasts until sleep.

invocation.name: Cure Disease II
invocation.description: Heals a disease, of a severity equal to one tenth the invocation roll (diseases are rated from one to five).

invocation.name: Enhance Sense II
invocation.description: Increases perception by 1 point for each 20 rolled with invocation. Lasts until sleep.

invocation.name: Tania's Pleasure II
invocation.description: Increases or decreases the size of one body part by 2% per rolled invocation.

invocation.name: Kilina's Whip II
invocation.description: Inflicts a severe jolt of pain on the person touched, causing stun damage equal to half the invocation roll.

invocation.name: Thalia's Luck II
invocation.description: For the next skill roll, allows one die roll per 10 rolled on the invocation. Subject can choose which result to take (e.g. a roll of 20 gives 2 rolls total, not two rolls extra).

invocation.name: Elomia's Tongue II
invocation.description: The priestess can speak and understand a language for the duration of the conversation. The priestess' skill is equal to one fifth the invocation roll.

invocation.name: Halea's Apple II
invocation.description: Blesses one apple per 10 rolled that, when eaten, prevents pregnancy and sexually transmitted diseases for a week. If five blessed apples are eaten in a day, an existing pregnancy will abort.

invocation.name: Sadura's Rash III
invocation.description: Inflicts a painful rash in the victims genitals that first appears in 3 days. A stamina roll must be made each day thereafter against a Difficulty equal to the invocation roll. Failure means the infection spreads and worsens. After five failures, the victim dies. A success stops the infection.
